oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-09-04 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-09-04 part 1. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring Big Maybelle, Jimmy Cavallo and the Houserockers, and the Moonglows. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sam "The Man" Taylor; Jimmy Cavallo; Houserockers; Big Maybelle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement (Alan Freed) -- Opening statement (Bern Bennett) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Push It (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Jimmy Cavallo and the Houserockers -- Rock, Rock, Rock (Jimmy Cavallo and the Houserockers) -- Alan Freed introduces Jimmy Cavallo and the Houserockers -- That's The Groovy Thing (Jimmy Cavallo and the Houserockers) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Big Maybelle -- Ring Ding Dilly (Big Maybelle) -- Alan Freed introduces Big Maybelle -- Candy (Big Maybelle)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Cavallo, Jimmy, 1927-; House Rockers (Musical group : Jimmy Cavallo); Big Maybelle, 1924-1972; Moonglows (Musical group); Sears, Al, 1910-1990; Lester, Bobby; Melamed, Louis
